ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Protecting servers (dedicated or cloud) on Windows and Linux from brute-force attacks and unauthorized access by automatically banning malicious IP addresses.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Auto ban IP addresses by detecting failed logins from event viewer and/or log files
ðŸ“– Summary: IPBan is a free, open-source security software for Windows and Linux that automatically blocks IP addresses attempting to gain unauthorized access to servers. It monitors system logs and event viewers for failed login attempts and uses firewall rules to ban malicious IPs, protecting servers from hackers and botnets.

ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a customizable and visually appealing dashboard for controlling and monitoring Home Assistant devices and entities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Modern, easy-to-use, and performant custom Home Assistant dashboard â€¢ Svelte-based frontend â€¢ Add-on installation for Home Assistant OS/Supervised â€¢ Docker installation for Container/Core users â€¢ Kubernetes support via Helm chart
ðŸ“– Summary: ha-fusion is a modern, user-friendly, and performant custom dashboard for Home Assistant, built with Svelte. It offers enhanced control and a visually appealing interface for managing smart home devices.

ðŸŒŸ OMG-Agent | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating mobile device operations using AI and natural language commands.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ AI-driven mobile GUI operation via natural language â€¢ Supports AutoGLM and GELab-Zero models â€¢ ADB real-time screenshot and task execution â€¢ Bilingual interface (English/Chinese) and theme support â€¢ OpenAI-compatible API support
ðŸ“– Summary: OMG-Agent is an open-source desktop client that enables AI to control Android phones through natural language commands. It integrates with mobile GUI models and uses ADB for real-time interaction, supporting both physical devices and emulators.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ antares | Vue
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: A cross-platform, free, and feature-rich SQL client for developers to manage and interact with various database systems.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Multiple database connections â€¢ Database and table management â€¢ Views, triggers, stored routines, functions and schedulers management â€¢ Tab system â€¢ Fake table data filler
ðŸ“– Summary: Antares SQL Client is a modern, fast, and user-friendly desktop application for managing multiple SQL databases. Built with Electron.js and Vue.js, it supports various database systems and operating systems, aiming to provide a productive and free alternative for developers.

ðŸš€ riot | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Building efficient and maintainable user interfaces with custom, reusable web components using a simple and elegant syntax.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Custom components with HTML syntax â€¢ Concise syntax â€¢ Simple API â€¢ Tiny Size â€¢ Performant and predictable DOM updates
ðŸ“– Summary: Riot.js is a lightweight and elegant JavaScript UI library that enables developers to build custom, reusable components using HTML-like syntax. It focuses on simplicity, performance, and close adherence to web standards, making it easy to integrate into existing projects or use as a standalone framework.
